{"id":1255786313,"question_id":3391,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1715486625,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"18 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1255786313/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Difference Score in a Grid","memory":"59.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxScore(List<List<Integer>> grid) {\n        int m = grid.size();\n        int n = grid.get(0).size();\n        \n        int[][] largest = new int[m][n];\n\n        largest[m - 1][n - 1] = grid.get(m-1).get(n-1);\n\n        for (int i = m - 2; i >= 0; i--) {\n            largest[i][n - 1] = Math.max(grid.get(i).get(n-1), largest[i + 1][n - 1]);\n        }\n\n        for (int j = n - 2; j >= 0; j--) {\n            largest[m - 1][j] = Math.max(grid.get(m-1).get(j), largest[m - 1][j + 1]);\n        }\n\n        for (int i = m - 2; i >= 0; i--) {\n            for (int j = n - 2; j >= 0; j--) {\n                largest[i][j] = Math.max(grid.get(i).get(j), Math.max(largest[i + 1][j], largest[i][j + 1]));\n            }\n        }\n        int res = Integer.MIN_VALUE;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            for(int j = 0;j<n;j++){\n                int max = Integer.MIN_VALUE;\n                if(i==m-1 && j==n-1)\n                    continue;\n                if(i == m-1)\n                    max = largest[i][j+1];\n                else if(j==n-1){\n                    max = largest[i+1][j];\n                }else{\n                    max = Math.max(largest[i][j+1], largest[i+1][j]);\n                }\n                int score = max - grid.get(i).get(j);\n                res = (res<score)?score:res;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-difference-score-in-a-grid","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
